title: Where Crypto and Banking Finally Click
description:
Why juggle 5 apps?

Fasqon's where you bank, spend, earn, chat, play, flex and after vibe - all in one place. Wire euros, clear bills and invoices, cash out crypto on shopping and still earn tokens daily just for keeping your balance!

Get $FSQN now while it's hella discounted. As supply burns and Fasqon levels up, so does your bag. Cop your tokens now, lock it on your card, and build with the squad.

features.name: Crypto Card
features.description: Discover a virtual or physical cryptocurrency card from Fasqon and spend cryptocurrency wherever and whenever you like.

features.name: Buy
features.description: Easily purchase cryptocurrency using your Fasqon Wallet. Enjoy low fees and instant transactions.

features.name: Sell
features.description: Convert your crypto back to fiat whenever you want, with transparent rates and quick payouts.

features.name: Swap
features.description: Swap between different cryptocurrencies in seconds, without leaving your wallet interface.

features.name: Earn
features.description: Stake or lend your crypto assets and earn passive income with Fasqon’s secure staking program.

features.name: Talk
features.description: Stay connected with built-in messaging and support chat. Ask questions, share tips, and grow together.

cards.title: Gold Crypto Card
cards.description: Available in virtual and physical formats, offering higher limits and premium perks. Supports Apple Pay & Google Pay, making crypto spending frictionless.

cards.title: Platinum Crypto Card
cards.description: A physical card with a unique IBAN for direct deposits and transfers. Enjoy global spending, ATM withdrawals, and seamless card-to-card transactions.

cards.title: Basic Crypto Card
cards.description: A virtual crypto card for seamless online and in-store payments via Apple Pay & Google Pay. Instantly issued with secure verification.

storeToEarn.description:
Earn passive income by simply holding assets in the Fasqon wallet and spending your reward anytime with Fasqon card.
Hold now. Pay never.

teamSection.title: Our Team
teamSection.subtitle: The company was founded in February 2023 in Portugal, by a team of individuals seriously concerned with the lack of convenient payment solutions for retail and business in web3.

partnersSection.title: Our Partners
partnersSection.subtitle: Backed and supported by highly professional companies on the market

items.question: What is FASQON and how does it ensure user privacy?
items.answer: Fasqon is a private AI-powered ecosystem designed for secure communication, crypto-fiat transactions, and confidential data storage. It uses seed phrase authentication instead of phone numbers or emails, ensuring user data remains protected. Messages and transactions are encrypted, and Fasqon does not store any personal information on centralized servers.

items.question: How does FASQON’s private bank card work?
items.answer: Fasqon offers a crypto-friendly bank card linked to a personal IBAN, allowing users to spend crypto and fiat seamlessly. The card can be topped up via SEPA transfers, P2P payments, and crypto deposits. For transactions up to €200, no KYC is required, ensuring accessibility while maintaining security standards.

items.question: How does the FASQON blockchain messenger work?
items.answer: Fasqon’s messenger is a secure, encrypted communication tool that does not require a SIM card for registration. Users sign up using a seed phrase, ensuring a private and secure connection. The messenger supports P2P transactions, allowing users to send payments directly through chat. All messages and transactions are encrypted end-to-end.

items.question: Can I participate in token sales on FASQON, and what are the stages?
items.answer: Yes, Fasqon’s token, FSQN, is available in different sales stages. The private sale rounds have set prices, with the next phase being a private round at $0.015 per token, followed by an IDO at $0.03. Users can participate in these sales through official Fasqon channels and partner exchanges.

items.question: How can I register on FASQON, and what information is required?
items.answer: Registration on Fasqon does not require personal data such as a phone number or email. Instead, users create an account with a seed phrase, ensuring a high level of privacy and security. This method eliminates the risk of identity leaks while granting full control over funds and communications.

items.question: What unique features does FASQON offer?
items.answer: Fasqon combines a Web3 wallet, a private bank card, a secure messenger, and AI-powered financial tools in a single platform. Key features include a personal IBAN, crypto-fiat conversions, P2P payments, encrypted messaging, AI assistants for financial automation, and a Play-to-Airdrop rewards system.

fsqnTokenSection.title: FSQN Token
fsqnTokenSection.description:
With our FSQN token, you get access to all the functionality of our platform!

The utilitarian FSQN token enables payment for services, access to features, transparent emission distribution, various token sale stages, and participation in a promising project's development.

tokenUtilitySection.title: Token Utility
description: Access the enhanced features of our messenger/wallet by maintaining a certain token balance.
Receive discounts on commissions and service fees by using FSQN tokens for payments.
Benefit from our daily buyback strategy, with 25% of profits used to purchase and burn tokens.
Explore trading opportunities within our platform for potential gains.

items: Expanding to the regions of Asia and the Middle East
